710866f-a.title: Manhattan: 3rd Street (East) - Bowery
710866f-a.text:
Nos. 1-7 East 3rd Street, adjoining and east of the N.E. corner of
the Bowery. Note the two old houses at Nos. 1 and 3.
May 9, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

716780f-a.title: Manhattan: Bowery - Great Jones Street
716780f-a.text:
35e-354 Bowery, adjoining and north of the N.W. corner of Great Jones
Street.
April 3, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
